Righteous Enforcer of the Law.

customize.name: Chevreuse
customize.desc:
Executor of Justice: Chevreuse

Righteous Enforcer of the Law.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: Can also be exchanged using a

customize.name: Blank Dynamic Card
customize.desc: A blank card with a painted back. It is said that if you put the name of your desired dynamic card on this blank card, you can get the very skin from the Association agent located at the tavern.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Playing against a skilled opponent is no different from engaging in specialized brain training. Such things are very helpful to us Special Patrol members... So long as they don't get in the way of work."
<color=#ece5d8>Hint: Chevreuse's deck is built around the Overloaded reaction. She can trigger it easily and obtain many buffs for doing so.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Chevreuse
customize.desc:
Executor of Justice: Chevreuse

Righteous Enforcer of the Law.

customize.name: Kuki Shinobu
customize.desc:
"Mender of Tribulations" Kuki Shinobu

Master of all trades, deputy of the oni.

customize.name: Fischl
customize.desc:
"Fischl, Prinzessin der Verurteilung!" Fischl

"Oz, mine familiar, spread thine wings and weave for me a new fate in the gloom of this night!"

"Mein Fräulein, you cannot expect me to fetch you a replacement card…"

customize.name: Match Invitation Letter
customize.desc: You can select a player from the Player List via the invitation board, and then entrust The Cat's Tail to send out an invitation using this Invitation Letter. The invited player will head over to the tavern and wait for a duel with you.

customize.name: Chevreuse
customize.desc:
Executor of Justice: Chevreuse

Righteous Enforcer of the Law.

customize.name: Vanguard's Coordinated Tactics
customize.desc:
Chevreuse: Vanguard's Coordinated Tactics

"The Special Security and Surveillance Patrol deals with a whole host of heinous crimes and dangerous criminals. As such, the methods we employ to enforce the law can be a bit on the... harsher side."

customize.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Achieve victory with characters defeated less than twice during the battle</color>

customize.name: Vanguard's Coordinated Tactics
customize.desc:
Chevreuse: Vanguard's Coordinated Tactics

"The Special Security and Surveillance Patrol deals with a whole host of heinous crimes and dangerous criminals. As such, the methods we employ to enforce the law can be a bit on the... harsher side."

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Top-notch tactics. Very interesting. This is no longer so much training for the brain as it is a unique sort of 'wargame'"...
<color=#ece5d8>Special Rule: "Chevreuse" starts with the Talent Card "Vanguard's Coordinated Tactics" equipped.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

<color=#ffffffd9>Prerequisite</color>
Reach Player Level 7
Complete 3 challenge objective(s) in Chevreuse: Friendly

customize.name: Player EXP
customize.desc: Obtained by winning Genius Invokation TCG matches. Every duel you won builds upon the paths to victory, such is the act of earning experience itself. To know how to overcome and subdue the adversary in any situation is the greatest strength that a player can possess.

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color>
Deals 2 <color=#ff9999>Pyro DMG</color> .
<color=#ffffff>After the Skill finalizes:</color> If your Hand has <color=#ffffff>Overcharged Ball</color> : <color=#ffffff>Discard</color> 1 of them and heal the character on your team that has taken the most damage for 1 HP.

<color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color>
Deals 2 <color=#ff9999>Pyro DMG</color> , creates 1 <color=#ffffff>Secondary Explosive Shells</color> on the opponent's side of the field.
<color=#ece5d8>Secondary Explosive Shells</color>
<color=#ffd780>Combat Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>After a character switch takes place on this side of the field:</color> Deal 1 <color=#ff9999>Pyro DMG</color> to the character switched to.
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 2</color>

<color=#ffd780>Passive Skill</color>
(Passive) <color=#ffffff>After an opponent's character takes Overloaded reaction DMG:</color> Create 1 <color=#ffffff>Overcharged Ball</color> card in your Hand (Once per Round)
<color=#ece5d8>Overcharged Ball</color>
<color=#ffd780>Combat Action</color>
<color=#ffffff>Combat Action</color> : Deal 1 <color=#ff9999>Pyro DMG</color> to the opponent's active character.
<color=#ffffff>When this card is Discarded:</color> Deal 1 <color=#ff9999>Pyro DMG</color> to the opponent's active character.

<color=#ffd780>Event Card</color>
<color=#ffffff>Combat Action</color> : Deal 1 <color=#ff9999>Pyro DMG</color> to the opponent's active character.
<color=#ffffff>When this card is Discarded:</color> Deal 1 <color=#ff9999>Pyro DMG</color> to the opponent's active character.

Applies Pyro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> + <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Melt</color> : DMG +2 for this instance
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> + <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Vaporize</color> : DMG +2 for this instance
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> + <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Overloaded</color> : DMG +2 for this instance, the target is forcibly switched to the next character
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> + <color=#99ff88>Dendro</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Burning</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [ <color=#ffffff>Burning Flame</color> ] that will deal 1 Pyro DMG at the end of the Round (Takes effect once, max 2 stacks)

<color=#ece5d8>Physical DMG</color>
Physical DMG will not apply any Elements, nor can it engage in Elemental Reactions.
<color=#ece5d8>Combat Action</color>
After you finish 1 Combat Action, it will be your opponent's turn.
<color=#ffffff>Playing a card from your Hand with this rule is also a Combat Action rather than a Fast Action</color> .
<color=#ece5d8>Discard</color>
Use Action Cards or Character Skill effects to Discard Action Cards from Hand or Deck.
<color=#ece5d8>Usage(s)</color>
After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#ffffff>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.
This card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#ffffff>Usages</color> remaining.

value.name: Vanguard's Coordinated Tactics
value.desc:
Chevreuse: Vanguard's Coordinated Tactics

"The Special Security and Surveillance Patrol deals with a whole host of heinous crimes and dangerous criminals. As such, the methods we employ to enforce the law can be a bit on the... harsher side."

value.text: Reward for inviting Chevreuse to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

value.name: Chevreuse
value.desc: The captain of the Special Security and Surveillance Patrol, who wears justice as an ever-present seal upon her heart. Her musket shall only ever point at the guilty.
